response.summary: Industrial engineer passionate about the optimisation and digitalisation of production processes and the supply chain with the aim of achieving more sustainable results. I am motivated by leadership and people management, as well as user-centred project management.

profile_positions.description: Digital transformation project manager for Mars Wrigley's supply chain in EU. Driving deployment of new digital methods and tools in collaboration with stakeholders across the supply chain in Europe to facilitate value creation in line with business objectives. I work with agile methodologies, project management and Design Thinking to ensure results in terms of scope, cost, time and quality.
profile_positions.title: MW EU Digital Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Global Apps Development Senior Analyst in Outbound logistics. Drive the development of Order-to-Cash in SAP products and projects. company.name: Mars
company.description:
We’re a unified force of 140,000+ Associates, taking action every day toward the world we want tomorrow. 

Our Five Principles have kept us true to ourselves and to our commitment to treat others in ways that are consistent with those values. Having stood the test of time, these principles will continue, keeping us free to move quickly and plan for the future.

Quality - The consumer is our boss, quality is our work and value for money is our goal.

Responsibility - As individuals, we demand total responsibility from ourselves; as Associates, we support the responsibilities of others.

Mutuality - A mutual benefit is a shared benefit; a shared benefit will endure.

Efficiency - We use resources to the full, waste nothing and do only what we can do best.

Freedom - We need freedom to shape our future; we need profit to remain free.
